analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#985-1012):
	External calls:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaisedTotal)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#997-1000)
	- tokensBought = getToken().balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#1001-1004)
	External calls sending eth:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaisedTotal)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#997-1000)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#1001-1004)

Crowdsale.minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#228) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- isMinimumGoalReached (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#552-553)

Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#259) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investWithCustomerId (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#417-426)
	- invest (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#427-440)
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#493-497)

Crowdsale.signerAddress (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#262) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#493-497)

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#985-1012) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#985-1012) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0
PreICOProxyBuyer.getState (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#462-477):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#474)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#475-477)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#358-414):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#366-380)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#380-383)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#398-401)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#398)

PreICOProxyBuyer.claim (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#1041-1067) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#1063-1065)
SafeMathLib.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#30-41) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#724-728) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#305-347):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#327-332)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#344)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#334)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#343)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#358-414):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#366-380)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#380-383)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#389-394)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#388)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#394-397)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#562-592) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#578-591)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#572-591)

Crowdsale.minimumFundingGoal should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#228)
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#259)
Crowdsale.signerAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#262)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#172)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xfc5ecc864a5f3ebbc0d63f4c4a968cab99a6c580.sol#198)
